articles.title: Red Rocks employee: "I've never seen an event go south like that" - CBS Colardo
articles.description: An employee working at Red Rocks Amphitheater when the concert crowd was viciously pelted with hail Wednesday night was critical of the decision to delay the performance which, in his words, gave the fans hope the show would go on as planned.
